attributes.action: abolish the practice of putting the clocks forward in spring then back again in autumn.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a proven fact that by altering the clocks by 1 hour each spring and autumn there is  a rise in the number of accidents to people and property. In this modern world there is no longer any need to mess with time so i propose leaving the clocks as they are and thereby reducing the burdens placed on hospitals in treating accident victims.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
